title: 禁止一个世界扔东西的插件！
author: PokerFace丶
txt_content:
主城经常有玩家扔铀，导致玩家被辐射！求一款插件，可以保护在某个世界禁止扔东西！
谢谢！1.7.10的！

replies.author: 诺白
replies.txt_content:
给玩家添加权限
/mangdelp Builder essentials.build.drop.物品ID
例：/mangdelp Builder essentials.build.drop.1
就是给Builder添加上禁止丢石头的权限。

replies.author: PokerFace丶
replies.txt_content:
诺白 发表于 2016-5-15 16:20
给玩家添加权限
/mangdelp Builder essentials.build.drop.物品ID
例：/mangdelp Builder essentials.build ...
支持mod物品么？

replies.author: PokerFace丶
replies.txt_content:
诺白 发表于 2016-5-15 16:20
给玩家添加权限
/mangdelp Builder essentials.build.drop.物品ID
例：/mangdelp Builder essentials.build ...
添加显示这个组没有这个权限，不能删除
